channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report E-2023120441
item.description:
Report E-2023120441

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: GURABO
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Veolia employees were at Veolia's 10-day intransit facility in Gurabo, PR when they detected a strong odor coming from one of the trailers. Further investigation revealed that a 55 gallon drum had over pressurized and spilled chemicals. The spill was contained within the trailer and did not exit out or under the trailer. The Veolia employees cleaned up the spill caused by the overpressure of the drum and put the drum inside a 851H2 overpack, the residues of material collected from the spill were also put inside the same overpack.
